snippet.title: CAPTAIN BLOOD ANNOUNCEMENT TRAILER
snippet.description:
Captain Blood is a pirate-themed action game where you play as a fearsome pirate seeking gold and glory. Expect wild adventures with cannon firing, pistol shooting, swashbuckling sword fights, and plenty of pirate shenanigans. This action-packed hack'n'slash features fierce combat, hordes of enemies, and flashy combos.

WISHLIST NOW ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3040220/Captain_Blood/
